title: Is Trump better at being president or better at being a TV game show host? - Quora
tags: Presidents of the United States of America

response.answer_text: History will not be kind to Donald. To my knowledge, no one died or suffered life-changing trauma on his TV shows. We could choose to turn the channel. Might I suggest that the words, ”president and tv show host” do not correlate in any way other than being words in the English language. Trump was a bad tv host and is now a dangerous President.
I thought he sucked as a game show host and I changed the channel whenever it came on. He is even worse as as a president.
